My Skills.blurb: I don't do 3D Modelling as much anymore due to lack of necessity but when I do, I use Blender

My Skills.name: Robotics (2022)
My Skills.blurb: I mainly did this in High School, as I don't have access to a lot of the equipment at home now that I've graduated

My Skills.name: Computer Engineering (2022)
My Skills.blurb: I focus more on computer software now due to lack of access to equipment and shifting interest. I have experience with Raspberry Pi, ESP-32, and Arduino Uno

My Skills.name: Graphic Design (2022)

My Skills.name: Web Design (2023)
My Skills.blurb: I self taught HTML and CSS because I wanted to learn about websites and create them, you are looking at the results

My Skills.name: Visual Studio (2025)

Programming Language Proficiencies.name: Cv2 (2021)

Programming Language Proficiencies.blurb: I am actively self teaching NASM x86 assembly using Linux, specifically for the purpose of learning reverse engineering and furthering my cybersecurity knowledge

Programming Language Proficiencies.blurb: I am actively self teaching Kotlin for android app development

Favorite Video Games.name: Pokemon TCG: Pocket
Favorite Video Games.blurb: I've gotten into it recently, and it is very addictive, would recommend

Favorite Video Games.name: Rec Room
Favorite Video Games.blurb: Rec Room is a social VR/screen game where you can play thousand of player-made games with friends, or make your own. The game is not in a great state right now, but I enjoy making content on it and talking to people

Favorite Video Games.name: Clash Royale
Favorite Video Games.blurb: I'm on hiatus from mobile games, so I am not actively playing it

Favorite Video Games.name: Brawl Stars
Favorite Video Games.blurb: I'm on hiatus from mobile games, so I am not actively playing it

Favorite Video Games.name: Phasmophobia
Favorite Video Games.blurb: Phasmophobia is a game all about hunting for ghosts in various haunted locations and escaping before you're killed. I enjoy playing this in VR with friends because the chaotic nature never gets boring

Favorite Video Games.name: Minecraft
Favorite Video Games.blurb: Its Minecraft. What else is there to say? Who doesn't like Minecraft?

Favorite Video Games.name: Terraria
Favorite Video Games.blurb: Terraria is very nostalgic to me, and I go through a Terraria phase roughly once per year it seems

Favorite Video Games.name: Doom Eternal
Favorite Video Games.blurb: I got it a few summers ago, it's pretty fun. I'm also excited about the new DOOM game releasing May 2025

Favorite Video Games.name: Blade and Sorcery
Favorite Video Games.blurb: It's basically VR medieval PVE. Swords, bows, wizardry, all the good stuff

Favorite Video Games.name: H3VR
Favorite Video Games.blurb: Hotdogs, Horseshoes, and Hand Grenades is a VR gun sandbox game

Favorite Video Games.name: Bloons TD 6
Favorite Video Games.blurb: Bloons TD 6 is surprisingly fun for a game about balloons lining up in an orderly queue to be popped by chimpanzees in quirky outfits

My Hobbies.name: Gaming

My Hobbies.blurb: I like playing badminton. I don't really do it competitively, but it's still fun to play
